thread.section_title: Hotel Giuliana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Better than you'd think
thread.title_full: Better than you'd think - Review of Hotel Giuliana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Andy W
title: Better than you'd think
text: Ok, well the Hotel Guiliana is rated 2 star, it's not flash and its hidden on the first floor (behind a big wooden door) in a huge building.That said, what it is is central Rome with easy access to all sights either walking or by tour bus. It is very clean, the staff are smiley and very helpful, the continental breakfast is as good as I've had anywhere and it's cheap. Not a lot more to say except that if all you require is a base somewhere central to lay your head, you can do a lot worse
